name: Lyra Pro
short_description:
Lyra Pro for the Tandy Color Computer 3
This project is an attempt to enhance Lester Hands' original Lyra program for Coco. In the future there are plans to port this program to NitrOS-9 and improve the number of voices, upgrade the GUI to Coco 3 Hi-Res Graphics, add real-time Midi recording, and a "piano-roll" style editing interface
Mr. Hands' original RSDOS assembly language code is archived here for references as well as possible enhancements to the RSDOS version as well.
 This project has the full permission of Lester Hands and possibly his help in making it a reality.

Any suggestions or questions should be directed to me:
Bill Pierce
ooogalapasooo@aol.com
summary: Open Source project for Lester Hands' Lyra for Tandy color computer
